chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type

Goal:
forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l2 t2

Premises:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive subst_pred : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> Prop := subst_pred_id : forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred [t1] [t2] t1 t2 | subst_pred_node : forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> subst_pred (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4) Arguments subst_pred (_ _)%list_scope Arguments subst_pred_id _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments subst_pred_node _ _ _ _
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
ordered_cover : forall A : Type, list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop
subst_pred_ordered_cover_l : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l1 t1
ordered_cover_node : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
subst_pred_node : forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> subst_pred (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
subst_pred_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P [t1] [t2] t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) ->...-> P l l0 b b0
subst_pred_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> P [t1] [t2] t1 t2) -> (forall (t1 t2 t3 t4 : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> P l1 l2 t1 t2 -> subst_pred l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P l3 l4 t3 t4 -> P (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) (node t1 t3) (node t2 t4)) ->...-> P l l0 b b0
height_pred_node : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
cover_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
subst_pred_id : forall t1 t2 : btree A, list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> subst_pred [t1] [t2] t1 t2
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_cons_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover (t2 :: l1) (node t2 t1)
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n [n] [t] t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n [n] [t] t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
cover_ordered_cover : forall (A : Type) (l1 : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l1 t -> exists l2 : list (btree A), permutation l1 l2 /\ ordered_cover l2 t
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
Inductive height_pred (A : Type) : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := height_pred_nil : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), height_pred n [n] [t] t | height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments height_pred [A]%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments height_pred_nil _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments height_pred_node _%type_scope _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
ulist_ordered_cover : forall (A : Type) (l1 : list (btree A)) (l2 : list A) (t : btree A), ordered_cover l1 t -> ulist l2 -> l1 = map (fun x : A => leaf x) l2 -> all_leaves t = l2
height_pred_shrink_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (a b : nat) (t1 t2 : btree A), ln = ln1 ++ a :: b :: ln2 -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a) -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 (b :: ln2) -> n1 <= a) -> length ln1 = length l1 -> l = l1 ++ t1 :: t2 :: l2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ Init.Nat.pred a :: ln2) (l1 ++ node t1 t2 :: l2) t

```coq
intros t1 t2 l1 l2 H.
induction H using subst_pred_ind.
- intros. apply subst_pred_ordered_cover_l. auto.
- intros. apply ordered_cover_node.
  + apply IHsubst_pred1. auto.
  + apply IHsubst_pred2. auto.
Qed.```

original: intros t1 t2 l1 l2 H. induction H using subst_pred_ind. - intros. apply subst_pred_ordered_cover_l. auto. - intros. apply ordered_cover_node. + apply IHsubst_pred1. auto. + apply IHsubst_pred2. auto.
